job.title: Software Engineer

inclusive financial worldltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a Software Engineer to join our team who will build microservices on a cloud platform You will be involved in building testing deploying monitoring and supporting critical systems Youll face and solve a wide range of challenges technical product and operational shaping your personal growth and career along the wayltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtWhat will you doltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtDevelop and test systems and services that enable us to deliver our missionltligtltligtParticipate in environmentltligtltligtGenerate ideas for new initiatives and technologiesltligtltligtCommunicate with project counterparts and other software developers to deliver solutionsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtWhat do you needltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtOur core stack is NodeJS  Express  MongoDB and we run on Docker in a service oriented architectureltligtltligtAbility to design and implement batch processing systems to support onboarding new municipalities ETLPythonAWS lambdasetcltligtltligtExperience working on a SOA or microservice based application andor experience moving files between different systems for processingltligtltligtBasic understanding of databasesltligtltligtWillingness to roll up your sleeves collaborate with
